alert.note: Alert for Cook (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 23 at 7:07PM CDT until June 24 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL COOK COUNTY... At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northeast of Eagle Mountain, or 17 miles north of Grand Marais, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pine Lake, Tom Lake, Clearwater Lake, Bearskin Lake, Poplar Lake, Daniels Lake, North Fowl Lake, Watab Lake, and Judge Magney State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
